title: OMG ANIVIA GOT NINJA BUFFED THIS PATCH
body:
SHES NAMED EGGNIVIA AGAIN IN EGG FORM GG SHES USABLE NOW{{champion:34}}
TY FOR FIXING

replies.body: Came in here expecting it to be a stealth title for a post praising the return of Eggnivia. Was not disappointed!

Started reading your reply expecting it to be a stealth post lamenting raging despite the return of Eggnivia. Was disappointed. 

grEgg bEgg mEgg I rEgg it Egg/Egg - EggGn
Now we just need {{champion:84}} {{champion:85}} {{champion:98}} {{champion:238}} to have their Flippin Ninja buffs and for {{champion:41}} to have his pirate buff back too
You forgot the mighty pirate... Hunter!{{champion:21}}
Don't forget {{champion:41}}'s Scurvy "buff"
its been that way for about 4 years...

> [{quoted}](name=Machet,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=gpwb7Ywp,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-03-25T21:00:49.790+0000)
>
> its been that way for about 4 years...

It was previously removed for idk how long lol.

I posted this about three months ago, right when it got ninja changed for no reason. soo around this post.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/FeL9sNj8-where-did-eggnivia-go
I remember when they changed it to eggnivia. good times.

I LITERALLY JUST BOUGHT HER :D
Let the Faceroll begin.
PATHETIC SLYTHERIN! One does not "faceroll" Anivia!
She requires precision, calculation, and a heap of other fancy words in order to play to her fullest. Face rolling is for paeans like Riven.
Still, noone expects dat damage. Your first 2 kills midgame are basically free because of that.

rererererererererererererererererererererereererererererere
Was gonna copy paste.
yea you press rer and chunk them to half
Why haven't they given Veigar his auto laugh on ult kill back? =(

OMG REALLY? If this is true then all I can say is I CHOOSE YOU, ARTICUNO!

The nerfs to "Eggnivia" chat made her unplayable for me, tbh.
Cryophoenix Egg, Never Forget!
Prepare for LCS play.
Oh yes
Maybe it's time to learn her!
Eggcellent!

> [{quoted}](name=BakedLotion,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=gpwb7Ywp,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-03-25T20:59:51.638+0000)
>
> SHES NAMED EGGNIVIA AGAIN IN EGG FORM GG SHES USABLE NOW{{champion:34}}
> TY FOR FIXING

U scared me... :P yes im super happy its back!, but I thought u were serious. I don't want everyone playing my birdie :)
What are you talking about? She's been Eggnivia since season 4...

> [{quoted}](name=Rarara,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=gpwb7Ywp,comment-id=000c,timestamp=2015-03-26T19:15:50.577+0000)
>
> What are you talking about? She's been Eggnivia since season 4...

It was removed... Then brought back this patch
love u anivia

I...wow.

brb, using Anivia again
